name: part_000
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】1 day 4 colors【#ホロ4期生ライブ2025】 [H8A2CZiyc_E]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening title card for the '1 day 4 colors' 3D live performance by Hololive 4th Generation.
Promotional information for Hololive 4th Generation's 5th anniversary membership rewards.
Transition and stage setup for the first performance.
Amane Kanata performs 'Kakushinteki Metamaruphō-ze!' on stage.

subtitles.original: ホロライブ4期生 5周年記念！
subtitles.english: Hololive 4th Gen 5th Anniversary!

subtitles.original: U-M-R! U-M-R! UMA じゃないよ うまる!
subtitles.english: U-M-R! U-M-R! Not a UMA, it's Umaru!

subtitles.original: U-M-R! U-M-R! UMA じゃないよ うまる!
subtitles.english: U-M-R! U-M-R! Not a UMA, it's Umaru!

subtitles.original: はんてんしんてい うれいや遊び倒せ!
subtitles.english: Flip it over, forget your worries, and play 'til you drop!

subtitles.original: もっと もっと 楽しめよ乙女
subtitles.english: Enjoy even more, young maiden

subtitles.original: みんなに気づかれないように
subtitles.english: So that no one notices

subtitles.original: いざゆけひもうとライフ!
subtitles.english: Go forth, dry-sister life!

subtitles.original: お気に入りのフードかぶり
subtitles.english: Putting on my favorite hood

subtitles.original: 今日も今日とてゴロゴロして
subtitles.english: Rolling around today just like always

subtitles.original: 大好物のポテチを手に
subtitles.english: With my favorite potato chips in hand

subtitles.original: パソコンとにらめっこしちゃえ
subtitles.english: Having a staring contest with the computer

subtitles.original: 立てば芍薬 座れば牡丹
subtitles.english: Standing like a peony, sitting like a tree peony

subtitles.original: 歩く姿は百合の花
subtitles.english: Walking like a lily flower

subtitles.original: 誰もが羨む完璧JK
subtitles.english: A perfect high school girl everyone envies

subtitles.original: ほら玄関くぐったら変身だ
subtitles.english: Look, once I cross the threshold, it's a transformation

subtitles.original: さあぐーたらに極楽!
subtitles.english: Now, it's lazy paradise!

subtitles.original: いつだって 食う・寝る・遊ぶの三連コンボ
subtitles.english: Always the three-combo of eat, sleep, and play

subtitles.original: ずっと ずっと ゲームは友達
subtitles.english: Forever and ever, games are my friends

subtitles.original: お兄ちゃんは厳しいけど
subtitles.english: Big brother is strict, but

subtitles.original: きっと きっと 許してくれちゃうの
subtitles.english: I'm sure, I'm sure he'll forgive me

subtitles.original: わがまま放題は
subtitles.english: Being as selfish as I want

subtitles.original: 大好きの裏返し!
subtitles.english: Is just another side of my love!

subtitles.english: U-M-R! U-M-R! Not a UMA, it's Umaru!

subtitles.original: 外では猫かぶり
subtitles.english: Outside, I'm a goody-goody

subtitles.original: 今日も明日も演じるのです
subtitles.english: I'll keep acting today and tomorrow

subtitles.original: 大好評の笑顔を武器に
subtitles.english: With my highly acclaimed smile as my weapon

subtitles.original: 友達にバレないように
subtitles.english: So my friends won't find out

subtitles.original: 立てば二等身 座ればまん丸
subtitles.english: Standing at two heads tall, sitting like a perfect circle

subtitles.original: 歩く姿はちんちくりん
subtitles.english: Walking like a little runt

subtitles.original: 誰でも
